Class SpecialVM

java.lang.Object
RegularVM
SpecialVM
public class SpecialVM extends RegularVM
This class is in charge of handling the slots, items, and logic of a special vending machine

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class RegularVM

    itemChoices, slots

    • SpecialVM

      public SpecialVM()
      This constructor sets the default value of special vending machine by calling its parent's class constructor. It also sets the Item choices for the users
